description:
Tsuchida-sensei is resting at home to recover from his cold when his doorbell rings. When he goes to answer it he finds a concerned Anzu who has come to care for the sick Tsuchida-sensei. Ignoring the startled Tsuchida-sensei, Anzu get to work cleaning. Despite her confidence, Anzu gets herself into trouble, and Tsuchida-sensei spends the day looking after her instead of resting.
Tsuchida-sensei takes Anzu home after another one of her visits and ends up helping Sakura with her work. Her positive attitude towards the mountain of work inspires Tsuchida-sensei to reflect on his feelings about his own job. The next day, Tsuchida-sensei heads to Yamamoto-sensei`s apartment with new resolve.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Hanamaru wife, A Hanamaru Story
Hanamaru na Oshikake Nyoubou / Hanamaru na Ohanashi
はなまるな押しかけ女房 / はなまるなお話
